admin_help_text:
ЁЯСС *Admin Commands* ЁЯСС
/admin_help - Show this help message
/admin_view_users - View all users
/admin_view_payments - View payment logs (WIP)
/admin_view_logs - View admin action logs (WIP)
/admin_update_user <user_id> <status> [days] - Update user subscription (WIP)
/admin_broadcast <message> - Send message to all users (WIP)
admin_no_users_found: No users found in the database.
admin_too_many_users_to_display: Too many users to display in one message. Consider pagination or more specific queries.
command_under_construction: ЁЯЫая╕П This command is currently under construction. Please check back later.
